name: Rogue AI
description:
How to play:

Grab & throw: RB button

Move: Left joystick to move character

Aim: Right joystick to aim character

Made for the Game Jam Battle 2018 in less than 45h

Blue teams objective is to stop the Roboloard from escaping

and the Red teams goal is to help it escape.
